entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:00 a.m. MST Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3Â°C

Observed at: Rock River 3:00 PM MST Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blizzard developing this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 this evening except east 80 near the Richardson mountains late this evening and overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h except east 80 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h except east 80 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 21 April 2023
